feed.title: Opinion on proof of stake in future

entry.title: Opinion on proof of stake in future
entry.summary: The discussion in the mailing list is still active and to add food for thought, the concept of Proof of Less Work (PoLW) has been reintroduced. PoLW can provide ideas for further discussion. The link to a document on Polw.pdf provides more information on the concept. The email was sent using ProtonMail Secure Email.
